explanation: There is a visible split in opinion, but recent chat momentum leans bullish on BTC with many users suggesting to buy or hold after the recent drop, referencing ETF inflows, institutional adoption (US housing finance agency allowing BTC as an asset), and technicals suggesting possible recovery. Some caution about short-term bearish momentum, but more representative opinions in this selection favor a bounce or an upside move coming soon.
